Silence::
She flew over them as they made thier way to the base.

*******

Wolfblade:
She was glad to be with him. She could smell his scent, feel his
touch, see his smile, know he was there. For a moment longer, she
could love him and show it. It wasn't long until they reached the
base. She kept a smile on her face, though her spark was breaking. 
She knew what she had to do. Letting him go would be the greatest test
of her existance.  She knew she would have to be strong. "Hey, well,
looks like we about made it."  She glanced up and saw Silence slying
up above.  She motioned for the bot to come down.

********

Silence::
She spotted the motion and swooped down.  She transformed into bot
form and stood by the entrance. 

*********

Wolfblade::
She kissed Malice on the cheek. "Hmm, wonder what's in the mess hall
for dinner tonight. I'm starved. How about you?" She wasn't really
hungry, but it would give her an excuse to slip away and fulfill her
plan to ease her pain.  




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice::
>  
> He nodded to her comment.  One less thing to worry about.  He had
enough to worry about already, but this was a welcome relief.  They
made good time back to base, and Malice had pulled Wolfblade close and
put his arm around her.  he knew she hurt over their relationship, he
knew Blacknightmare felt the same way.  But there was no good way to
solve it without everyone being hurt, not that he could see.  So for
now, things would have to remain as they were, and hope nothing turned
sour between the three of them.  
>
